938:2: śrutvā tataḥ sadvratamutsisṛkṣuṃ bhāryāṃ didṛkṣuṃ bhavanaṃ vivikṣum|
938:5: sa hrīmate hrīvinato jagāda svaṃ niścayaṃ niścayakovidāya||2||
938:6: nandaṃ viditvā sugatastatastaṃ bhāryābhidhāne tamasi bhramantam|
938:7: pāṇau gṛhītvā viyadutpapāta malaṃ jale sādhurivojjihīrṣuḥ||3||
938:14: śāntendriye tatra munau sthite tu savismayaṃ dikṣu dadarśa nandaḥ|
938:15: darīśca kuñjāṃśca vanaukasaśca vibhūṣaṇaṃ rakṣaṇameva cādreḥ||7||
938:16: bahvāyate tatra site hi śṛṅge saṃkṣiptabarhaḥ śayito mayūraḥ|
938:21: babhau gireḥ prasravaṇa pipāsurditsan pitṛbhyo'mbha ivāvatīrṇaḥ||10||
938:22: calatkadambe himavannitambe tarau pralambe camaro lalambe|
938:23: chettuṃ vilagnaṃ na śaśāka bālaṃ kulodgatāṃ prītimivāryavṛttaḥ||11||
938:32: kā nanda rūpeṇa ca ceṣṭayā ca saṃpaśyataścārutarā matā te|
938:33: eṣā mṛgī vaikavipannadṛṣṭiḥ sa vā jano yatra gatā taveṣṭiḥ||16||
938:34: ityevamuktaḥ sugatena nandaḥ kṛtvā smitaṃ kiṃcididaṃ jagāda|
938:35: kva cottamastrī bhagavan vadhūste mṛgī nagakleśakarī kva caiṣā||17||
938:36: tato munistasya niśamya vākyaṃ hetvantaraṃ kiṃcidavekṣamāṇaḥ|
938:37: ālambya nandaṃ prayayau tathaiva krīḍāvanaṃ vajradharasya rājñaḥ||18||
938:38: ṛtāvṛtāvākṛtimeka eke kṣaṇe kṣaṇe bibhrati yatra vṛkṣāḥ|
938:40: puṣyanti kecit surabhīrudārā mālāḥ srajaśca granthitā vicitrāḥ|
938:42: raktāni phullāḥ kamalāni yatra pradīpavṛkṣā iva bhānti vṛkṣāḥ|
938:45: atāntavānyekaghanāni yatra sūkṣmāṇi vāsāṃsi phalanti vṛkṣāḥ||22||
938:50: yatrāyatāṃścaiva tatāṃśca tāṃstān vādyasya hetūn suṣirān ghanāṃśca|
938:53: ākramya māhātmyaguṇairvirājan rājāyate yatra sa pārijātaḥ||26||
938:67: manāṃsi khinnāni tapodhanānāṃ haranti yatrāpsaraso laḍantyaḥ||33||
938:68: nityotsavaṃ taṃ ca niśāmya lokaṃ nistandrinidrāratiśokarogam|
938:69: nando jarāmṛtyuvaśaṃ sadārtaṃ mene śmaśānapratimaṃ nṛlokam||34||
938:70: aindraṃ vanaṃ tacca dadarśa nandaḥ samantato vismayaphulladṛṣṭiḥ|
938:72: sadā yuvatyo madanaikakāryāḥ sādhāraṇāḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ vihārāḥ|
938:78: tāḥ niḥsṛtāḥ prekṣya vanāntarebhyastaḍitpatākā iva toyadebhyaḥ|
938:79: nandasya rāgeṇa tanurvivepe jale cale candramasaḥ prabheva||39||
938:80: vapuśca divyaṃ lalitāśca ceṣṭāstataḥ sa tāsāṃ manasā jahāra|
938:83: lolendriyāśvena manorathena jehrīyamāṇo na dhṛtiṃ cakāra||41||
938:84: yathā manuṣyo malinaṃ hi vāsaḥ kṣāreṇa bhūyo malinīkaroti|
938:86: doṣāṃśca kāyād bhiṣagujjihīrṣurbhūyo yathā kleśayituṃ yateta|
938:90: mahacca rūpaṃ svaṇu hanti rūpaṃ śabdo mahān hanti ca śabdamalpam|
938:91: gurvī rujā hanti rujāṃ ca mṛdvīṃ sarvo mahān heturaṇorvadhāya||45||
938:93: avītarāgasya hi durbalasya mano dahedapsarasāṃ vapuḥśrīḥ||46||
938:96: etāḥ striyaḥ paśya divaukasastvaṃ nirīkṣya ca brūhi yathārthatattvam|
938:97: etāḥ kathaṃ rūpaguṇairmatāste sa vā jano yatra gataṃ manaste||48||
938:102: āsthā yathā pūrvamabhūnna kācidanyāsu me strīṣu niśāmya bhāryām|
938:103: tasyāṃ tataḥsamprati kācidāsthā na me niśāmyaiva hi rūpamāsām||51||
938:104: yathā pratapto mṛdunātapena dahyeta kaścin mahatānalena|
938:106: vāgvāriṇāṃ māṃ pariṣiñca tasmādyāvanna dahye sa ivābjaśatruḥ|
938:107: rāgāgniradyaiva hiṃ māṃ didhakṣuḥ kakṣaṃ savṛkṣāgramivotthito'gniḥ||53||
938:108: prasīda sīdāmi vimuñca mā mune vasundharādhairya na dhairyamasti me|
938:109: asūn vimokṣyāmi vimuktamānasa prayaccha vā vāgamṛtaṃ mumūrṣave||54||
938:111: ahaṃ hi daṣṭo hṛdi manmathāhinā vidhatsva tasmādagadaṃ mahābhiṣak||55||
938:112: anena daṣṭo madanāhinā'hinā na kaścidātmanyanavasthitaḥ sthitaḥ|
938:113: mumoha bodhyorhyacalātmano mano babhūva dhīmāṃśca sa śantanustanuḥ||56||
938:114: sthite viśiṣṭe tvayi saṃśraye śraye yathā na yāmīha vasan diśaṃ diśam|
938:115: yathā ca labdhvā vyasanakṣayaṃ kṣayaṃ vrajāmi tanme kuru śaṃsataḥ sataḥ||57||
938:116: tato jighāṃsurhṛdi tasya tattamastamonudo naktamivotthitaṃ tamaḥ|
938:118: dhṛtiṃ pariṣvajya vidhūya vikriyāṃ nigṛhya tāvacchrutacetasī śṛṇu|
938:119: imā yadi prārthayase tvamaṅganā vidhatsva śuklārthamihottamaṃ tapaḥ||59||
938:120: imā hi śakyā na balānna sevayā na saṃpradānena na rūpavattayā|
938:121: imā hriyante khalu dharmacaryayā sacet praharṣaścara dharmamādṛtaḥ||60||
938:122: ihādhivāso divi daivataiḥ samaṃ vanāni ramyāṇyajarāśca yoṣitaḥ|
938:123: idaṃ phalaṃ svasya śubhasya karmaṇo na dattamanyena na cāpyahetutaḥ||61||
938:124: kṣitau manuṣyo dhanurādibhiḥ śramaiḥ striyaḥ kadāciddhi labheta vā na vā|
938:125: asaṃśayaṃ yattviha dharmacaryayā bhaveyuretā divi puṇyakarmaṇaḥ||62||
938:127: ahaṃ ca te'tra pratibhūḥ sthire vrate yathā tvamābhiniyataṃ sameṣyasi||63||
938:128: ataḥparaṃ paramamiti vyavasthitaḥ parāṃ dhṛtiṃ paramamunau cakāra saḥ|
938:129: tato muniḥ pavana ivāmbarāt patan pragṛhya taṃ punaragamanmahītalam||64||
938:130: saundarananda mahākāvye “svarga-darśana“ nāma daśama sarga samāpta|
